fruits.description: A bright red fruit with tiny seeds on its surface.

fruits.description: A brown, fuzzy fruit with bright green flesh.

fruits.description: A sweet fruit with creamy flesh and green scaly skin.

fruits.description: A sweet, chewy fruit from the date palm tree.
